website_summaries.verdict: The perfect night-light for children. Shaped like a cute bear and offers a gentle light for peace of mind during dark hours.
pros: These night-lights offer a soft glow and their color can be customized
They’re battery powered or can be plugged in via a micro USB cord, meaning your children will have no reason to get near electric outlets
The light doesn’t get warm and the animal is squishy, so it’s safe to touch
cons: Some users had issues with battery life but were given a replacement after contacting customer service

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this light
customer_reviews.text: I can’t even explain how much my daughter loves this light. It literally calms her if she’s upset. She’s 3 months old and is so fascinated by the color breathing mode. And she knows that if you tap it it will change color. I highly recommend this to anyone with an infant. I plan to get a few more. You just have to watch what company you buy from. Lumipets (this company) is excellent. I bought a bunny from GoLine Tech and it broke and they have yet to respond to my email.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: First was defective, second lasted 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong, this is super cute and my kid LOVED it while it lasted. The colors are nice (a bit bright for a night light though), the color changing effects are cool, and my kid loved tapping it to change modes. But it lasting (or not lasting I should say) is the problem. We already had to order a replacement as the 1st one was defective, so then the 2nd one came and now 3 months later the power button and the charging port are both broken making it inoperable. And of course we're past the return window by 2 weeks. Waste of money, I'll be looking for a new brand for my kid's night light.
customer_reviews.author: chaospenny

customer_reviews.title: Cut but bright
customer_reviews.text: The bear is adorable. My kids love him, both the way he looks and how squishy he is. He's definitely brighter than I had hoped-- I was looking for a soft light to put in their room at night and this is bright enough to read by from anywhere in the room. Every color seems quite bright. We put a little blanket around him to make it not so bright and it works ok like that for us. My only other issue is that the battery seems to only last a night or two before it dies, so sometimes we plug it in and use it that way.
customer_reviews.author: Xan

customer_reviews.title: Too bright, poor charging cord.
customer_reviews.text: If you want an incredibly bright light, this would work well. But for my kids it is too bright. My four year old asked to take it out of his room because he had to turn his head to sleep “and could still see the light through his eyelids.” It is brighter than my cell phone and most of our flashlights. Also, the charging cord broke after two uses. However, otherwise, it is durable and the colors are good.
customer_reviews.author: Katie V

customer_reviews.title: My 5 week old states at it all night, he loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. My 5 week old is sort of colicky, but sometimes I'll just turn this on and sit it beside him and he's totally mesmerized by it. He will just sit there and stare at it for a long time and he can will reach out for it and stroke it. It's super cute and also works great as a nigh light.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the monsters away!
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is bright. I would say too bright but it's made for kids and they aren't complaining. I love how you can take out the bottom and washed the rest of it without worrying about electronic parts. Charging is easy and reliable. I purchased the one without remote control and in my experience it's good enough. I have a track record of losing remote control and i suspect these little remote control will be missing anyways. Just the simple tap motion sensor to change the color is good enough. In conclusion, it works great no problem here.
customer_reviews.author: Thavychu

customer_reviews.title: Adorable but faulty
customer_reviews.text: NEW REVIEW: New and improved Lumipet. My baby loves this night light and she can carry it out, change the colors by tapping, and she gives it a big kiss on the nose when she sees it. The tap issues from the previous version seem to be fixed. The soft silicone outer layer also easily deflates so it can be packed flat and small in luggage for trips. Love it! OLD REVIEW: 1st generation: This is adorable but the tap function and light changes no longer work. It only displays white light and can only function with the on off button.
customer_reviews.author: SeaMama

customer_reviews.title: sweet teddy bear lights up the night
customer_reviews.text: This little silicone nightlight is very cute, but also very sensitive. If you change it to one solid colour by tapping it, all you have to do is sneeze across the room from it and it will change again on its own. It is well made with no sharp edges or anything to concern parents and the size is nice. It is really bright for being a nightlight and allows you to see what is going on even in the darkest of places, but might be a bit too bright if you are buying it as a nursery light. A good product with a lot of interesting features. Kids are sure to love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ionia FromentTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Still good after one year
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this light for over a year. Charge really lasts a long time, full 10 hours and if you use it there or there it lasts for days. I wish there were less bright options and also all colors without changing. It has 4 settings: brighter white light, dimmer white light, rainbow colors switching smoothly, rainbow colors changing sharply. My 13 months son also tries to chew on it and loves to play with it (I wouldnt babies play with it without supervision though). To me even dimmer light is sort of bright. Overall I do not regret purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Pear Charles

customer_reviews.title: Returning, does not work as described
customer_reviews.text: It's impossible to get this to pause on a color as described. ONCE, in the week that I've had it, I've gotten it into slow mode - only to have it change back to color changing a few minutes later. It's a shame it doesn't work. It is very cute, my son likes it, the material is very nice. It's easy to charge as well. But there is no point in buying this unless you only want the fast color changing mode.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer

customer_reviews.title: Very soft!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler LOVES this night light! It is so soft, keeps its shape and doesn’t get hot. It will last all night, plus some! It did take time to figure out how to keep a set color (we don’t have the one with remote) - tap 4 times and wait (patiently) until desired color is showing, then we flick it near the bottom and press the button to lock the chosen color. I only wish it wasn’t SO bright. It is too bright to fall asleep with, so we use it to read our bedtime books
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love it, but...
customer_reviews.text: We love this light! It really helps my daughter with her fear of the dark. We had a night light that plugged into the wall, but she started to pull it out of the socket. I love that we can charge this, or use a long cable and plug it in behind the book shelf so she can't unplug it. However, last weekend we let her play with it, and now it won't charge for very long, and often turns itself off even when it's still plugged in! Thankfully it hasn't been in issue for my daughter, but I'm really sad that it isn't working the way it should when we've had it for less than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive to movements.
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly as described. Which I am very thankful for. My only issue is that it is VERY VERY sensitive. It changes color and mode with any slight movement. We had it on the stairs of my boys bunk beds(which are solid wood) and he sneezed near it and the light changed(seriously). So if your little one moves at all this will not stay on the setting you originally set it at. This is why I only gave it 3 stars. It's good but they really need to work on how sensitive it is.
customer_reviews.author: Dena K

customer_reviews.title: Cute bear light
customer_reviews.text: Adorable night light. A little too bright for my liking, but the different color settings helps to create the right ambiance for sleep. my son asked for a night light and I gave him this one for his birthday. He found the bear abosolutely adorable. I would suggest any buyer to place the light below eyesight (it’s bright). Minor Cons: The tap feature doesn’t really work well, but that’s not a deal breaker for us. The battery is quite short living... I now keep it close to a power source to plug every other night.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Arbelaez

customer_reviews.title: Needed a friend
customer_reviews.text: My toddler needed a bedtime friend to help her sleep in her own bed at night, and this bear did the trick! It's cute and cuddly, and she loves the lights. I gave it four stars because I found it a little tricky to get the light to work. You are supposed to tap it on the head to change the colors and patterns, but it only works for me 50% of the time. Luckily, it works much better for my toddler. It must be calibrated for little hands.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Forry

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: Originally we gave this light 1 star and returned it b/c it was far too sensitive and switched between modes constantly. The company reached out and offered to send the updated version for free to see if it was better. It seems as though they’ve responded to customer feedback and got it right this time around - the new version can charge while upright, doesn’t change colors at the slightest vibration, and has a remote control to boot. Very pleased with the new light and happy to say that this is a company that stands by their products.
customer_reviews.author: CGF

customer_reviews.title: Nice Night Light Option for Preschool Kids
customer_reviews.text: This is a great nightlight for a young child's room. The pet has several light settings, which are easy to change by tapping his head. There is a soft white light, a bright white light and two multi color light settings. My daughter loves the soft multi-color light setting.He is soft and cute and very much loved by my four year old. The pet does not plug into the wall, but is charged by a USB cable, which is easy to remove. This makes him portable, which is fun too.
customer_reviews.author: H1N1S1

customer_reviews.title: Cute and works really well!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is so cute and amazing. I ordered 2 for my kiddos, and they immediately loved them. They carry them everywhere. I am going to order another one for my nephew :) The light is just the right amount of brightness, and the color changing function has such a calming effect. The touch control works perfectly also. I kind of want one for myself to sit by my bed when I am winding down at night. I recommend this product 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Literally had for one night and it doesn’t work anymore. Received package and charged battery all day. Nightlight lit up and functioned as advertised for roughly four hours before it gave up the ghost. Thought maybe we needed to charge it again...no go. Thought maybe it would work when cord plugged into wall...no go. Buy a different light.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott C. Hahn

customer_reviews.title: This thing is BRIGHT
customer_reviews.text: I might have to double check the instructions, but BOY this thing is bright. we got it for the baby and even our 5 year old loves it and wants one. Super soft silicone, so it's SUPER easy to clean and safe to let the baby push it around. Regrettably, one sleepy night I jammed a cable into the charger and screwed up the USB. Kept the bear for play time and ordered different one. The colors can be soothing, just wish it had a brightness adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: YES! Einstein

customer_reviews.title: Best of everything: fun, functional and brimming with personality!
customer_reviews.text: Boy are we glad that we purchased a LumiPet! They are so soft and squishy - and fun to hold. Our son LOVES it. The light is so pretty and I love how we can change from low light to a brighter light. It's really beautiful when it rolls from one color to the next, or we have the ability to stop it at a particular color. A very smart feature is how you can peel off the base and wash the silicone character! With something this loveable it's nice to know that we can wash it. It's easy to charge and does it's job with perfection. Our family recommends LumiPets for your home!
customer_reviews.author: Honu

customer_reviews.title: Works Well for Us
customer_reviews.text: Our daugther loves this - she use to come to our room fairly often at night and she rarely comes now (it's recharchable and not a plug in item). It is cute, soft, and the light choices are nice and easy to use. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is that if you are not careful the recharger plug can get broken very easily. The first time it broke within a month but Amazon replaced it. The second one lasted about 10 months and then we had to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed unless you use the remote
customer_reviews.text: Pediatric sleep consultant and I try to use the red version of this Night Light. Using this without the remote is impossible to program. I don't use it as a toy for my clients and trying to program the red light only is it possible. It is so sensitive to touch and bounce it's a possible to turn it on and choose a color without taking 5 to 10 minutes. It's like meeting to tiptoe around a newborn :-) Do it with a remote or forget it !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: M Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but terrible battery life.
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves his LumiPet. However, the battery life on it is terrible. He wants it on the entire night and that means I have to charge it daily. It wouldn't be an issue if it wasn't for the fact that it's tough to use when plugged in because the plug goes underneath the bear, so you can't sit it upright for use. I just thought it would have a held a charge longer. I often forget to charge it during the day and my son ends up not being able to use it. Makes it a bit useless. But 3 stars for a fun and cute product.
customer_reviews.author: JMM

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 2 weeks, now it does not
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great initally. My 2.5 year old and 7 month old really loved it. One morning, 2 weeks after buying it, I went to charge it. The only thing I did differently was it was still turned on when I plugged it in. It stayed on for a little while while charging, then it turned itself off. The charging light never went from red to green, even after unplugging it for awhile, then trying to charge it overnight. The product never turned on again. I am disappointed this product only lasted 2 weeks. I did really like it while it worked.
customer_reviews.author: RK Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Colorful
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this little bear, uses it as a night light. Battery life is pretty good. I thought it was supposed to come with a remote control but it didn't... at least it's pretty bright so when I go in to turn it off after she falls asleep I can see where I'm going.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. My 2 year old is also very entertained by it. I would give 5 stars except I think it says it comes with a remote online. But then the box does not say that a remote is included. But directions for a remote are included. So that was confusing. I still love it because you really don't need the remote!! Also the battery life is NOT a problem like some people said in their reviews. Rather, after it goes off by itself you have to press the actual power button to turn it back on, as opposed to just tapping it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery/Light Base Constantly Falls Out
customer_reviews.text: I really want to like this night light but there are a few flaws I can’t glance over. The lowest brightness setting is extremely bright and keeps my son awake (counterproductive). And I was under the impression that it was okay for my son to hold and play with in bed while he fell asleep, which it is until the battery/light base pops out. It constantly pops out, and it’s been a chore to try to put it back inside the bear. It fell out once again but now I can’t locate the base so the bear is useless. It’s not meant for young children to handle at all. I’m disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerhouse of nightlights
customer_reviews.text: This thing has it all. It's cute, super durable (my one year old chews on it regularly and has done that since he was really little), and has great variety when it comes to brightness. And because it's an LED and cold heat, we spent many months throwing a few burp rags over it to keep it super dim (during the night nursing days especially) and it's totally safe. It's probably our favorite of all the baby products we have and I can see us using it for years to come. Battery life is impressive and easily plugs into any of our cell phone charges.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We bought the one without the remote. Our kids love it and it's easy to use. It works exactly as stated. I don't know how long one charge lasts but it seems the longer you charge it, the longer it lasts. It at least lasts one full night if not two. I don't know because the kids play with it during the day. Love that they can carry it around because they use it in their fort.
customer_reviews.author: JTanner

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful night light. It’s so cute and the different colors are fun! I love the different brightness settings. The kids like that they can unplug it and take it in their blanket fort. This is our 2nd nightlight, but the only reason we had to replace the first is because the kids were too tough with the charging port.
customer_reviews.author: Caittie

customer_reviews.title: Great item for littles!
customer_reviews.text: Our Lumipet is wonderful! He is darling and soft enough to stay in bed with my 5 year old who is in a top bunk. He can easily control the bear himself and likes to change the colors and whatnot. Great item to give kiddos who are a little scared of the dark an option that helps keep them in their own beds at night!!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Daniel

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Bought two bunnies for my twins a while back, from a different mfg., one is still going, one wouldn't shut off and died. This new one (bear) seem good. Charges 10x faster and has a different shut off switch. Not as bright as the other two, not necessarily a bad thing. Kids already know how to tap to make it brighter and color change etc. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: stretchinaz

customer_reviews.title: Worth it, with caveats
customer_reviews.text: I do really love this lamp. It's soft and my daughter loves picking out the color each night before bed. The things that I don't love, our first lamp crapped out after a few weeks so we had to get a replacement. Although they say your child can sleep with it, or that it's movable, I highly recommend keeping it static and plugged in. Also, the plug on our second bear would no longer stick, so we ended up having to glue it so it is always plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: emonster

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and safe !
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about it! My daughter doesn’t like the darkness so I bought this little night light and she doesn’t let it go! It became like her best friend. I love the fact that you can wash it and that you can choose the brightness and the color! Also, it’s very safe since it’s silicone so it doesn’t transfer electricity. My daughter is 3 years old and I ordered the bear without the remote. We love it ♡
customer_reviews.author: Benicio Fam

customer_reviews.title: Bright enough but bulb keeps falling out
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the bunny and the bear for the kids in place of night light plug ins. I ordered the bunny before the bear and my daughter really liked it so I ordered another one for my other daughter. The material is silicone and seems sturdy. The issue is the bulb keeps either falling inside the body cavity or falling out. Which makes it a little tiresome to have to fix it daily multiple times a day. The annoyance of having to fix it is why it does not get 5 stars. Plus not sure how it happen, but the USB plug pulled from the cord. So we just use one of our extra plugs from the Kindle.
customer_reviews.author: Octoberlily

customer_reviews.title: The light it self works great, and the colors are there
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light (w/o remote) and a different light from another company. This light does not last as long between charges. The switching between colors is also complicated. Other lights, my kid can keep tapping until they get the color they want. This one, they have to go through 3 color changing modes, and then on the 4th wait until the auto color rotation gets to the color they want, and then tap it to stop. The light it self works great, and the colors are there. It's just too complicated to switch the lights.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Cherian

customer_reviews.title: Love this nightlight!
customer_reviews.text: I was in search of a nightlight doesnt turn off every 5 minutes! Searched for hours and finally came across this one. I chose the standard version without a remote because it appeared it would stay lit all night! The remote version said set for up to 1 hr at a time. Received the bear and we were not disappointed!! Works perfectly and now i need another for my older son. He loves to cuddle and squish it. I also use it to light up the room while breastfeeding and changing diapers in the middle of the night. I carry the bear to and from
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: This is very cute and does its job. My daughter sleeps with light in her room and this lights up the room enough that she can see everything. It also changes colors and can be take off the charging cord for 1 night.
customer_reviews.author: majvanmeter

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Great little product. I bought it for my one year old daughter who had been obsessing over wanting to touch her sound machine that glows different colors when it was time to wake up. We got her this hoping it would relieve that urge and it has. Now she has her own little color glowing toy that she can play with. Pretty durable so far, it is constantly getting knocked around and so far so good. Love that you don’t need batteries
customer_reviews.author: Ness

customer_reviews.title: Awesome nightlight
customer_reviews.text: This has already become more than just a night light. Its soft/pliable, and changes color every time you touch it; a great recipe for a 2yo to love playing with. When we sleep it lights his room, and when he is awake it holds up really well to ninja moves. It doesnt have to stay plugged in to stay on so we can take it all around. I have already recommended this product to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: CWhite89

customer_reviews.title: when squeezed would let out air with an annoying whooshing squeeeee noise
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived, did not work as discribed. Wouldn’t change colors, had to hit all over and it would only change occasionally. Light was dim. Also, when squeezed would let out air with an annoying whooshing squeeeee noise. This plus hard plastic bottom made it unsuitable for the marketed purposes of giving to young toddler in their bed. This seemed like more of a cheap decoration than a baby friendly bright light. I would only recommend if it will be sitting untouched on a table. Not worth it, so many other options for that style of night light.
customer_reviews.author: Quinton Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Night Light!
customer_reviews.text: I have an 11 year old who still gets spooked at night if he wakes up. We have tried other lights that are either too bright or wear out too fast. This is perfect! It changes color and they aren't too bright. It's soft enough and stays cool so he can keep in bed with him. It isn't too baby either so he isn't embarrassed to have it sitting on his desk. It sort of reminds me of something you might use with an Alexa or Google Home with a kid. Anyways, he loves it and I love it and I am going to purchase one for my 17 year old who is jealous now!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Cook

customer_reviews.title: It's definitely cute..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my almost 5 month old, he loves it, though there are only a couple colors it will stay on solid. White, Bright Write, Red, and Yellow. Then it has the changing through colors mode. I thought it would do all colors. I plan to get the unicorn for my almost 5 year old. I'm just wondering if it works the same. Well anyway, it's cute and pretty sturdy. I'd give it all 5 stars if it wasn't for the fact that I can't change it to a solid color I want.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I like the recessed charging port allowing the light to be charged while on. It can be used without an electric outlet - useful for hotel rooms. We take it on vacation and keep it in the hotel bathroom. . I don’t like/ need the color changes though they are easy enough to turn off. Cute shape.
customer_reviews.author: CFE

customer_reviews.title: Helping one year old sleep better
customer_reviews.text: My one year old was having a hard time sleeping and waking a lot at night. We set this on red in the corner of his crib and he isn't waking screaming and putting himself back to sleep. We think he was scared waking alone in a dark room and this has helped him. He loves his "flashlight"!
customer_reviews.author: melissa tuthill

customer_reviews.title: i recommend getting the one w remote
customer_reviews.text: I got the version without the remote — and it was impossible to get it to stop on the color we wanted. So that was irritating. But then the thing just stopped working three weeks in. It looks like it’s charging fine but it doesn’t turn on. ***** UPDATE— the company sent me a new one w a remote! Great customer service. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Really cute and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this and so does my daughter. I like the feature where i can freeze it on a particular setting or color so my daughter doesnt accidentally change it. She can use it herself and she is 2.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Oxtoby

customer_reviews.title: Light Up Teddy
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift for a new baby named Teddy. While it is smaller than I expected it is soft and very cute, perfect for a child's room. It makes a nice little nightlight.
customer_reviews.author: kmd

customer_reviews.title: Nursery MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: Cute, soft light, doesn't get hot, so safe to touch for you and baby. I don't use the color setting much, but right now our infant is in our room with us and this makes enough light for me to change and feed him at night, (and make my way around the room), but it's such a soft light my husband and the baby aren't awoken by it. I absolutely LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: NurseNYC

customer_reviews.title: Great for story time!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My toddler loves this light. We turn it on for bedtime and I like that it's safe enough for me to feel comfortable with him sleeping with it. We turn the bright light on so I can read him a story and then I change it to the color cycle and hit the power button once and it keeps it where it needs to be and hes good all night! I might get one for my 1 yr old too
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Handrigan

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I feel like we got a defective product but I’ve already thrown away the box and everything. I start tapping and it goes from soft white to bright white to red to nothing. When I finally get it to go through the colors and I tap it to stop it doesn’t stop. I’m so frustrated with this product and it doesn’t even last a whole night without being plugged in. Buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good light, needs to charge often
customer_reviews.text: Night light is super squishy and very bright. Lots of colors that my son loves. Gave this 3 stars because it doesn't hold a charge very long. I have to charge it everyday or run the risk of it not working at bedtime. Would love it if it would auto shut off after about 30 minutes. Worth noting that my 3 year old does love his bear.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer7993

customer_reviews.title: Did not work ! :(
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this since I just moved my little one to his room and wanted him to have a cute night lamp but when I received it, I tried turning it on and it did not work :(, I connected it to the charger maybe it was dead but did not work either, was able to contact the seller and they responded very quickly, they said they shipped a new one and will arrive in about a week. We’ll see if that one works.
customer_reviews.author: estefania

customer_reviews.title: This is a cute little guy
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute light. It’s bright enough and has lots of colors. I’m glad I didn’t order the one with the light since it’s one more little thing to keep track of and keep out of a baby’s mouth. It’s simple enough to touch the light and have it change colors. I love the feel as well.
customer_reviews.author: JENNA G.

customer_reviews.title: My 7-month-old niece is in love with this thing
customer_reviews.text: My 7-month-old niece is in love with this thing. It's her favorite toy, and watching her figure out how to change the colors is a joy. Only real problem is a lack of age recommendation/safety instructions. Additionally, I thought I'd ordered the remote kind but it didn't come with a remote, and now my order doesn't seem to reflect that, so definitely could be forgetfulness on my part rather than failure on the part of the shipper.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi C

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: Love this.. Put it in the crib with my grandson. Now that he is a year old I think he will be able to turn the light on and off by himself!! The colors are pretty when they change and it is very soft and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: msprocrastinate

customer_reviews.title: Huge hit with the kids
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two for our 3 and 4 year old to use at night - instant hit. They're soft, easy to wipe clean, nice size, and came charged! Straight from the box to trying them out. Still their first day, but they've already survived a few wrestling and soccer moves (and a few steals from the puppy) with no complaints. Colors are vibrant but not glaringly bright, easy for the kids to use, base is easy to pop in and out. They're pretty awesome, planning to get a 3rd for a niece.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Fulcher

customer_reviews.title: Great lights but charging port is a failure waiting to happen.
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights. We have the bear & the bunny. Unfortunately both of them have lost the ability to charge. They lasted about 10 months, but the sliver of metal in the charging port has broken off. One nearly completely gone while the other has lost 1/2. Will be looking for replacement lights for sure, just not sure which ones to choose next.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Super cute Night Light
customer_reviews.text: I Love the LumiPets Night Light its so Cute I purchased the bear For my 10 month old son. Its made of Silicone so its really soft my Baby loves it the Night Light has A Touch Sensor I think he likes that because its constantly changing colors on him it docent heats up so i let him sleep with it. I was very impressed with it its better than I expected. 💙
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I questioned the quality of the battery of my Lumipet. I called the company (they give their company information in the shipping box for issues like these). They immediately sent a replacement. I only give this 4 stars instead of 5 because in the end, the battery life is just not that great. It needs to be charged nightly. It won't make it through 2 full nights. Everything else about the product is great for my toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too bad .
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the idea for this light , however the charge didn’t even make it through the night for my little one ended up having to use her other night light so unfortunely will be returning . It’s really too bad because we put a canopy tint over her bed hoping this would subside inside with her .
customer_reviews.author: San Diego

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed! I was so excited to try this nightlight after reading the great reviews. I fully charged the bear nightlight until the charge color changed from red to green. The night light didn’t even last the whole night. I had it on the lowest setting. I charged it fully the next day and had the same problem again.
customer_reviews.author: Rnorwood2312

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter's room at night. Mainly for the night light but the noises are a nice touch too. The only thing I don't like is that it's kind of hard to figure out if you tapped it enough times for what you want. My daughter loves it and even hugs it good night!
customer_reviews.author: VeganMama

customer_reviews.title: We adore this!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it's designed to play with as well. My daughter loves carrying it around during the day, then she "puts it to bed" on the dresser by her crib... and it turns into her nightlight! So clever. We adore this item.
customer_reviews.author: King Family

customer_reviews.title: Good deal and good build
customer_reviews.text: The battery seems to last for ever my baby absolutely loves it. Very entertaining for her, keeps her from crying most of the times. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Breaks too easily
customer_reviews.text: Break easily and the light setting don't work as well as I would like. But the kids liked them for the brief time they were intact.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My kids love it, shines bright enough to fill the room but not to much to disrupt sleep. They can play with it too, which is awesome. The only down fall is the battery only last one and a half nights usually so we have to charge it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but ineffective
customer_reviews.text: I like how cute and simple it was. Nice lighting too. But it’s a cheap product, has to constantly be charged, sometimes even died while being charged which caused my toddler to panic in the middle of the night. Charger broke after little time, 16 dollars down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase! Its a good size for the price and small hands. The material is a soft silicone product. It is quite durable, my 2 year old has already thrown it on the tile floor. The lights are pretty colors and very bright. What I really like about it though is it can be charged like n electronic device and doesnt need to be plugged in. It has a sensor on the bottom when moved or touched changes the color.
customer_reviews.author: michael mccraw

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly and too bright
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cute light, and my son likes it. However, it’s much brighter than I anticipated though there is a low light setting, but it’s only in white. My son always wants to have the bear in blue. It’s also hard to change the settings. You have to tap the bear over and over to change the color and it doesn’t always respond. It’s not very user friendly which is annoying when I’m tired and trying to go through our bed time routine.
customer_reviews.author: Landj

customer_reviews.title: Loved it but...
customer_reviews.text: We received it and my son immediately loved it! I put it to charge and waited till bedtime to officially try it out. The downside is that it was just way too bright for us. Even with the dim setting. My son just ended up covering it up or covering up his face with the blanket. So we said our good byes as I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with "Bugsly"
customer_reviews.text: I came back to redo my review! The company reached out to me so I could fix this correctly. I did not have the base in correctly. My son LOVES this thing :) I was so excited to get this in I knew my 3 year old would love it! Hes already named his bear "bugsly" It's super soft and the light is not too bright for my sons room. Today is the first night we used it and I am so upset the bottom keeps popping out. I dont know if they all do this or just mine but I was just really hoping it would be more durable. :(
customer_reviews.author: Kalene G

customer_reviews.title: Charging station defect
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one. First was a bear. Our son (almost 3) loves it! We have had the bear since Christmas 2018. The charging base in the bear went bad and won’t take a charge any longer. We ordered another to give it a shot again (since our little man loves it so much!) We ordered a bear .... received a bunny.... not going to waste the time or companies money sending it back.... just keeping the bunny. I would definitely recommend this item pending the charging system doesn’t fail again on us. 👌
customer_reviews.author: KtV

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this night light!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has had trouble sleeping in her room through the night. We’ve tried the typical night lights that plug into the wall and this weren’t bright enough to make her feel comfortable. We tried this light because she was able to cuddle with it and she LOVES it! The light lasts about 2-3 nights, all night, before needing to be recharged. It’s bright enough to light up the room but has a cool light tone that doesn’t keep her awake, and the fact that it’s soft and cuddly is a huge bonus. Now she has no problems now sleeping in her room all night.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Chacon

customer_reviews.title: Best Nightlight
customer_reviews.text: Love this bear. It gives off a perfect amount of light for the kids room. SIMPLE. They love the colors and they feel safe.
customer_reviews.author: KMHEATON

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: It’s very cute, and my son loves it. It is too bright to be a nightlight. You also have to charge it almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: JBBaxter

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This light super duper cute!!! My kids love them, i will buy more for sure! You can change the color of the light it just so cute! Love it. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: A miracle for our 3 year old!
customer_reviews.text: Best thing that ever happened to my 3 year old. We fight him so much to go to sleep but now that we own the cute little lumi pets bear, he feels secure enough not to get out of bed a million times! Lumipets for the win!
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Biggest waste of money for a night light
customer_reviews.text: Well this light worked for a total of 15 minutes and that was it!! Incredibly disappointed in the cheap quality. I am appalled that this product did not work and I am now stuck with it while having to buy another light for my toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie H.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging around 2 month mark
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for my children. Like many other reviews have mentioned, one of the two stopped charging. I reached out to the seller to describe the issue and requested a new LED insert. They replied that their quality check team would follow up with me, but they never did and failed to resolve the issue. Save your money for a better night light product with greater longevity.
customer_reviews.author: lisatx

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work long.. a few months maybe
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy...it sucks. Yet here I am having to buy another one because they only last 2 months (if that) and my daughter will only use this night light (parents you know how that is!) so if I could get a replacement at least once that'd be cool.
customer_reviews.author: Allison W.

customer_reviews.title: It’s pretty bright, brighter than most night
customer_reviews.text: My two and a half year old is obsessed with this thing! He takes it to bed every night and throws a fit when it dies. I’m bummed I didn’t get the one with the remote, as they were out of stock at the time, as I have to go in his room after he falls asleep to turn it off. It’s pretty bright, brighter than most night lights
customer_reviews.author: JMomma2

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his new bear! The look on his face was worth the price. And he now sleeps with it every night.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! My grandson loves it! It has 2 levels of brightness with the white light. My grandson loves the color transition the most. I love that it is usb rechargeable, so no need for a million batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it is adorable, the lights are wonderful
customer_reviews.text: it is adorable, the lights are wonderful. my only issue is with the charger which it only works when it wants to and I have to put in diferent positions for it to charge, and overall the battery doesn't last long so Ive been having to charge it every other night some time every night.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Miot

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and nice to look at.. price is very reasonable!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this night light! My grandsons nursery is almost complete so I purchase one for his room, well my almost 2 yr old grandson loves it soooo much I order another ( 1-whale & now 1-bear) .. he loves it and we love! Very inexpensive for the quality. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! My 2.5 year old loves "bear" and carries it around with him all the time. It's soft, flexible, yet stands up to a rowdy boy who likes to throw everything. It has great lighting choices, and the low white light has worked great as a nightlight every night since we got it. It holds its charge for two nights straight so far, including a little use during the day. I will likely buy the bunny as well. FYI, if your child happens to step on it and either deflate it or pop the bottom light source out, you can easily pop it back in and blow a quick breath into it to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Allen

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 3 year old daughter. She absolutely loved it. Yesterday the charging indicator stopped lighting up when I plugged it in, and with it the entire thing stopped working. Now my daughter is crying. Would have been 5 stars if it lasted, instead now it just causes more hardship.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I really like this night light it’s cute convenient and my son absolutely loves it. The battery life is awesome it definitely took me by surprise with how long the charge lasts. however my only complaint is the bottom falls off every time my son touches it it’s easy to pop back on just gets a little annoying sometimes. over all pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: John Mccaffrey

customer_reviews.title: Cool light
customer_reviews.text: I purchased several of these lights to put on my table at the campground. Very cute, and very soft, but bright enough light.
customer_reviews.author: MO

customer_reviews.title: Find something else
customer_reviews.text: The design of this light is super cute, but it’s really not user friendly. There’s no way to adjust the brightness, and all of the colors are really much too bright. The tapping mechanism to change colors is so tedious and kind of a headache to get it to the exact color you want. We ended up buying a different one for these reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So fun
customer_reviews.text: Great night light. Soft and fun for little kids. However I didn’t realize it only has a light and no sound. And since I was looking for a sound machine we returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: mario

customer_reviews.title: Great nightlight
customer_reviews.text: My 18 mo old granddaughter gets scared in the dark and refuses to sleep in her room, I got this hoping it will help her to sleep in her crib, she loves this bear! I even purchased another one for my step daughter who is afraid to sleep in the dark! She loves it and isn’t afraid anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money Had to return Wouldn’t function properly right from the start Which gave me safety concerns hard to believe all the positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Momof04

customer_reviews.title: my son loves this bear!
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this bear! He loves the ability to change colors or just have it white! The battery started to not last after about six months. I contacted the seller and they shipped me out a new one immediately! We love the product and the excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: martha ross

customer_reviews.title: This is cute bigger than i expected, a little ...
customer_reviews.text: This is cute bigger than i expected, a little bummed it doesnt take batteries and has to be charged with a powercord but that has its up sides too. Its also kinda soft and squisy i wasnt expecting that but i dont mind it. My three year old likes it but its too distracting for him to use at bedtime.
customer_reviews.author: Mj.creates

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old loves it. The only issue I have is it stopped charging after having it for 6 months. I contacted Lumie Pets direct and they said to call Amazon and they could track the warranty and replace the base or the whole thing. Amazon knew of no such agreement. Amazon gave me a refund which was very nice of them. Lumie pets and Amazon need to straighten their agreement but we love the light.
customer_reviews.author: W. Clark

customer_reviews.title: After just 2 days it doesn’t really work
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I gave it one star is because it’s supposed to change to multiple other colors just by touching the top of the light, but after just 2 nights of use I practically have to beat it with my fist to get it to change to the brighter white color and it usually doesn’t work. I only use this while I’m doing a diaper change, so it only gets turned on 2-3 times per night.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: A big hit
customer_reviews.text: We hoped for the remote to come with the bear. But to be honest it was no biggy. My cousin’s little girl plays with this thing all the time and wants to take it everywhere. It lasts a very long time on one charge and I love all the different colors and transition modes it provides.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Hepner

product_meta.title: Lumipets Bear Night Light for Kids Cute Silicone LED Animal Baby Nursery Nightlight Which Changes Color by Tap - Portable and Rechargeable Gift Lamps for Toddler and Kids Bedroom
feature_bullets: SOOTHING LIGHT: LumiPet soother nightlights offer a gentle and calming glow for children of all ages
SAFE AND GENTLE: Soft and never too warm, a child can safely rest dim Lumi Pets in their crib or bed
CORDLESS: Battery operated lamps can also be powered using the micro USB outlet plug in for charging
EASY CONTROL: Go from white to colors with a tap on the pet shaped lamp. Automatically turns off after an hour
PORTABLE: Boys and girls will love carrying their light from bedroom to hallway or bathroom at nite

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars476 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
